author: Al Jazeera
title: Putin: Redrawing borders, rewriting history
description: News of Ukraine invasion floods the airwaves – we look at media narratives, myths and Putin’s push to rewrite history.
content: As news of Russias invasion of Ukraine floods the airwaves, and with the prospect of a wider conflict brewing in Eastern Europe between Russia and the NATO alliance, we are dispensing with our usual … [+1572 chars]
